DellVirtualDisk.description: An instance of DellVirtualDisk will have data specific to the Virtual Disks in the system.
DellVirtualDisk.longDescription: An instance of DellVirtualDisk will have data specific to the Virtual Disks in the system.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

BusProtocol.description: The property shall represent the bus protocol.
BusProtocol.longDescription: The property shall represent the bus protocol.

Cachecade.description: The property shall represent the Cachecade property can have following values and shall be one of the following values:0-Not a cachecade Virtual Disk,  1-Cachecade Virtual Disk.
Cachecade.longDescription: The property shall represent the Cachecade property can have following values and shall be one of the following values:0-Not a cachecade Virtual Disk,  1-Cachecade Virtual Disk.

DiskCachePolicy.description: The property shall represent the policy for physical disks included in the virtual disk.
DiskCachePolicy.longDescription: The property shall represent the policy for physical disks included in the virtual disk.

LastSystemInventoryTime.description: This property provides the time when System Inventory Collection On Reboot (CSIOR) was last performed or the object was last updated on iDRAC. The value is represented as yyyymmddHHMMSS.
LastSystemInventoryTime.longDescription: This property provides the time when System Inventory Collection On Reboot (CSIOR) was last performed or the object was last updated on iDRAC. The value is represented as yyyymmddHHMMSS.

LastUpdateTime.description: This property provides the time when the data was last updated. The value is represented as yyyymmddHHMMSS.
LastUpdateTime.longDescription: This property provides the time when the data was last updated. The value is represented as yyyymmddHHMMSS.

LockStatus.description: The property shall represent if this Virtual Disk is locked.
LockStatus.longDescription: The property shall represent if this Virtual Disk is locked.

MediaType.description: The property shall represent the drive media type.
MediaType.longDescription: The property shall represent the drive media type.

ObjectStatus.description: This property represents the virtual disk configuration state.
ObjectStatus.longDescription: This property represents the virtual disk configuration state.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

OperationName.description: This property represents the operation that is running on a virtual disk in background. If no operation is running, the value is "None".
OperationName.longDescription: This property represents the operation that is running on a virtual disk in background. If no operation is running, the value is "None".

OperationPercentComplete.description: This property represents the percentage of completion of the operation that is represented by the OperationName property.
OperationPercentComplete.longDescription: This property represents the percentage of completion of the operation that is represented by the OperationName property.

PrimaryStatus.description: This property represents the status of the device.
PrimaryStatus.longDescription: This property represents the status of the device.

RaidStatus.description: This property represents the RAID specific status.
RaidStatus.longDescription: This property represents the RAID specific status.

ReadCachePolicy.description: The property shall represent the current read policy.
ReadCachePolicy.longDescription: The property shall represent the current read policy.

RemainingRedundancy.description: This property provides information about the remaining redundancy of the virtual disk.
RemainingRedundancy.longDescription: This property provides information about the remaining redundancy of the virtual disk.

SpanDepth.description: The property shall represent the number of spans in virtual disk.
SpanDepth.longDescription: The property shall represent the number of spans in virtual disk.

SpanLength.description: The property shall represent the number of physical disks per span.
SpanLength.longDescription: The property shall represent the number of physical disks per span.

StartingLBAinBlocks.description: This property represents the starting logical block address in blocks for virtual disk.
StartingLBAinBlocks.longDescription: This property represents the starting logical block address in blocks for virtual disk.

StripeSize.description: This property represents the current strip size.
StripeSize.longDescription: This property represents the current strip size.

T10PIStatus.description: T10PIStatus indicates whether T10 Protection Information is enabled on the virtual disk.
T10PIStatus.longDescription: T10PIStatus indicates whether T10 Protection Information is enabled on the virtual disk.

VirtualDiskTargetID.description: The property shall represent the virtual disk target number.
VirtualDiskTargetID.longDescription: The property shall represent the virtual disk target number.

WriteCachePolicy.description: The property shall represent the current write policy.
WriteCachePolicy.longDescription: The property shall represent the current write policy.

title: #DellVirtualDisk.v1_2_0.DellVirtualDisk
